content: for all kinky lgbtqia+ people i designed a plug pattern to show your flag in a fun way the patter includes instructions to realize flags with 3 4 5 or 6 colors so that includes most of the pride flags enjoy disclaimer better to specify the obvious but the pattern is not to be used as an actual toy ___________ contains - **desktop version** 2 pdfs with pictures in english and italian - ️**printable version** 1 pdf without pictures to print 1 pdf pictures only as reference for the printed one i d love to see your plushies share a photo on instagram tagging me @dragonsyarn ___________ pattern design © 2023 susanna berra dragon s yarn all rights reserved the pattern is for personal use only do not sell or reproduce the pattern or parts of it you can sell items made from this pattern as long as they are handmade by yourself in limited number and you give me credit as the designer susanna berra dragon s yarn - @dragonsyarn
